Interface SignMessage

All Superinterfaces:
SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
SignMessageImpl
public interface SignMessage extends SonarObject
A sign message represents a message which can be displayed on a dynamic message sign (DMS). All values in these messages are *immutable* -- if any changes are needed, a new sign message must be created.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

    • getMsgOwner

      String getMsgOwner()
      Get the message owner. It contains 3 parts, separated by semicolons, for example "IRIS; operator+schedule; john.smith" 1. System ("IRIS") 2. Sources ("operator+schedule") 3. Name: user or action plan ("john.smith")
      Returns:
      Message owner
      See Also:
      • SignMsgSource

    • getMsgPriority

      int getMsgPriority()
      Get the message priority.
      Returns:
      Priority ranging from 1 (low) to 255 (high).
      See Also:

    • getDuration

      Integer getDuration()
      Get the message duration.
      Returns:
      Duration in minutes; null means indefinite.
